about_the_game:
This is the upgrade of The Occupation which includes all of the Deluxe Edition content including: The Occupation OST, Concept Art, Vinyl Art, Poster & Comics.

The Occupation Original Soundtrack by Nathaniel-Jorden Apostol features over an hour and a half of music created exclusively for The Occupation. The soundtrack comes in MP3 format along with custom artwork for the soundtrack.

MP3 format files will be placed in The Occupation folder in your Steam game install directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\The Occupation\Deluxe Edition Content\The Occupation Original Soundtrack\
